eas_text: A civil authority has issued AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE for the following counties or areas: Mohave, AZ; at 12:27 AM ON DEC 31, 2025 Effective until 08:27 AM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
A SAFE Alert has been issued for Mohave County Sheriff's Office. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. Mohave County Sheriff's Office is looking for white male, Alonzo Hogue last seen on foot wearing a copper-colored shirt, brown vest, blue jeans and brown boots. Alonzo is 6 feet 1 inch tall, 175 pounds, white hair, green eyes, and suffers from a medical condition which may cause him to become confused.

If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
